title: Solo Q w/o Dynamic would be better than Dynamic w/o Solo Q
body:
The biggest problem with Dynamic Queue is the fact that players aren't queueing support either because they play it sometimes and don't want to play it always, or they never play it. This makes queue times larger when compounded by the fact that you have to match GROUPS and not INDIVIDUALS together.

Honestly, how many people played solo vs. duo before? Very very few people played duo exclusively. Most people have played solo and will play solo again...Even if it means we can only do it. Why are we having Dynamic forced down our throats? Like no one was really clamoring for it...We had norms, ranked teams, and duo queue.

replies.body:
my biggest problem with dynamic queue is being stuck with toxic premades, at least in soloq if the team turns against you its generally because your in the wrong. 4 randoms > 1 random.

fuck premade bias.

> [{quoted}](name=Grimspeake,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=IFo05Gfb,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-03-23T14:45:20.301+0000)
>
> my biggest problem with dynamic queue is being stuck with toxic premades, at least in soloq if the team turns against you its generally because your in the wrong. 4 randoms > 1 random.
> 
> fuck premade bias.

When I point out a suggestion top defends the buddy and I click tab

Essence reaver Udyr jg and I check his match history id like to say stop boosting

No Solo que is Toxic ville patch 6.6 Dynamic is far more team oriented and superior in tactical like minded people

I love this compare to "random pick order" que people get where top 3 players dictate the lane choices.{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}

i think this is a lot of the reason why Lyte things everyone enjoys dynamic queue so much

there are still SO many people that think dynamic queue is the new champ select.

and for the most part, people like new champ select.

but dynamic queue sucks ass
I don't think anyone wanted Dynamic Queue because that's what we had Ranked Teams for? The only difference is now you can basically cheat your way to a certain rank.

> [{quoted}](name=A Miss Fortune,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=IFo05Gfb,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-03-23T19:14:09.652+0000)
>
> I don't think anyone wanted Dynamic Queue because that's what we had Ranked Teams for? The only difference is now you can basically cheat your way to a certain rank.

How are they cheating their way to a certain rank? In dynamic Q everyone has to work well together to be successful. Don't tell me you have forgotten about those games you lost because one person failed to cooperate. Instead of continually bashing the system, maybe you should try to be friendly enough in your games that you can meet 4 other people that wouldn't mind playing with you. You don't even have to make "friends" you just need to find 4 other people that enjoy winning as much as you do to do what's necessary to improve at the game.

that is definitely not true. with dynamic queue it's incredibly easy to carry people out of their rank. i'm saying this as someone who has a smurf in low silver that i use to carry my bronze friends out. they want end of season rewards, i put them in gold despite the fact that they're still at a low bronze skill level.

hate me all you want i'm just legally abusing the system that riot gave to me

i'm not doing it for money or anything, but dynamic queue definitely benefits boosters more than anyone else. a team of smurfs can put anyone at any rank without that person being good AT ALL.

> How are they cheating their way to a certain rank?

Because you can be matched against people with less or more people in a premade. Riot even admitted that while there is only about a 1% chance, you still can get matched up with your team being all solo queue players while the entire enemy team is one single premade. Dynamic Queue is cheating your way to a certain rank because it represents the skill of your entire team, not you. You can be a not-so great player but still achieve Platinum easily simply because your team is composed of well rounded players who know how to win.
Million-to-one chances crop up nine times out of ten.

Exactly! I'd rather have fair matchmaking than having the ability to play with 3 or 4 people in ranked. Who had ever asked to play for specifically with 3 or 4 people (before you could duo in ranked or if you had 5 play teams)?
Reading some of these comments is giving me a headache... do people really not understand the difference between the new champ select and dynamic Q? :|
Exactly. Champ select has its problems but it's overall an improvement. The issue is queue times are so much longer and the only way to really fix them is to make everyone solo...

Better for who?

Better for you, for me. Sure.

But Riot doesn't give a fuck about that. If it's not better for Riot, they don't give a single fuck.

> [{quoted}](name=Sugar Momma,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=IFo05Gfb,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-03-23T14:18:13.066+0000)
>
> The biggest problem with Dynamic Queue is the fact that players aren't queueing support...

{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}} 

**THIS HAS NOTHING TO DO WITH DYNAMIC QUEUE WHATSOEVER.**

**DYNAMIC QUEUE IS NOT THE SAME THING AS THE NEW CHAMP SELECT.**
Ok then im confuse.... whats the new champ select?
Dynamic queue is the ability to queue with 1-5 players. The new champ select is the ability to pick 2 roles, and the bottom 3 players ban, and that stuff.
Three bottom* players.
thanks m8
Dynamic queue has nothing to do with the new champ select. The amount of support players would be the same, solo or dynamic.
Yes, but the queue times will be faster because if everyone is solo it's easier to match people together. This is especially true in high elo.
True.

Support Main.  I am EXACTLY the person you WANT in Dynamic Que to speed things up. 

Guess what.  It blows.  I am not being the odd man in a group of premades NOR do I want to be against them.

SMITE is pretty fun, Casual Non-Ranked LOL is still fun, Paragon might turn out ok.  Give me a reason RIOT to play your trash gamemode which breaks "Skill" by making 'Teammates" even a bigger component. 

Oh wait...you can't.

#Retiredfromranked

New queue system has caused me to basically stop logging on.  I used to have a chance at whatever role I felt like at the time, with respect to pick order, and now, when I have tried to do something other than support, the queue took over 20 mins.
Totally different issue bro.

> [{quoted}](name=Snake on bush,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=IFo05Gfb,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2016-03-24T00:42:54.236+0000)
>
> Totally different issue bro.

Not really; reread the first paragraph.
I'm willing to be last pick, but to have to support to get a reasonable queue time?  No more money from me.
Best option is pick by randomly assigned order, which has been done for years.  Could even do role select, timed, in order of pick, at the same time as the enemy, prior to pick intent, and then the system would be more "fair".

Again, totally different issue.

Dynamic queue has nothing to do with those issues.

We are talking about premades here.

Just a question, why would a company make such a drastic change to its game when no one wanted it? The most logical answer is that they wouldn't. The vast majority of people that play this game wanted it and all the vocal minority are on the boards hate it. A company that is trying to make money isn't going to go against the majority of its customers. Sorry if you don't like dynamic queue but you have the same amount of control in the game as you ever have because you can only control yourself. If you are a solo matched with 4 randoms or a pre-made four you still can only control you.

Sending a survey to a small group of people who may not even play ranked, isn't something I'd call "vast majority".

The sample size of that survey was so small, in fact, we don't even know what questions were asked!
The biggest issue is people think new champ select is the same as dynamic que  solo dynamic que and champ select are different
